channel.title: Anyone come across this webclient error?
channel.description:
I can't make sense of this error: [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/1czods0xvv923yc/runtimeexception.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/yud4a77xr86209o/nexterror.png[/img]
Numerous google search's have provided me with zilch. Anyone care to share any hints? I know there is working webclient's out there so please.
If anyone can help that would be amazing.
Cheers,
-Senior.
EDIT, Got another error: Put tracing on because it wouldn't show me an error. [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/6uzrtwhv3g27hn6/error3.png?dl=0[/img]

item.title: Anyone come across this webclient error?
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

First of all, Google Chrome does not support Java webclients as of now.

Also, If you’re going to play it on IE, you still need a certificate which costs around $100.

So tell me, is a webclient really worth it?

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone come across this webclient error?
